description:
Dubbing himself "Shogun Keroro," the platoon leader creates a castle worthy of being his new base of operations.  But it all goes drastically wrong when the castle develops a mind of its own and runs out on them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Élevons un château / Keroro et son château ambulant
ケロロ 育てよ城! であります / ケロロ の, 動く城! であります
